description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fkpmo","text":"Immunohistochemistry protocol for c-FOS and Parvalbumin co-staining of mouse brain tissue slices (30 microns thick).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"81t4q","text":"All shaker incubations are done at 200 rpm speed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"76hvh","text":"Antigen Retrieval","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17kmu","text":"Remove PBS from wells. Add 500ul 0.3% citrate buffer into each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqvdf","text":"Incubate at RT on shaker for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhp5f","text":"Incubate at   for 45 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"14a9m","text":"Cool down on the bench for 20 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"614db","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99i6k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0F4B05F0DE2311ED8089479FB840183C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fmf6j","text":"3X PBS Washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ek16","text":"Remove citrate buffer from wells and replace with 500ul 1X PBS (or use a dropper pipette and fill the well halfway)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88l1g","text":"Incubate at RT on shaker for 15 min  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"63g93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F6C6CE30E2B711ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","id":0,"step_guid":"D2508BE0E2B711ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","title":"remove PBS and replace with new 1X PBS, repeat two more times"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4j3b5","text":"Block Non-Specific Signal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acpo5","text":"Make enough: 10% NGS (Vector Labs, #S-1000-20) in 0.3% triton-X PBS for all samples (500ul per well)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90tfd","text":"Remove PBS and replace with blocking reagent 500ul per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"724h5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i270","text":"Incubate on shaker RT for 60min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adqa4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egt4l","text":"Primary Antibody ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mkrc","text":"Make enough: mouse anti-parv (1:1000, Sigma-Aldrich, #P3088) and rabbi anti-cfos (1:1000, cell Signaling, #2250S) in 1% NGS (Vector Labs, #S-1000-20) in 0.3% triton-X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2r2dv","text":"Replace the blocking reagent with primary antibody mix, 500 ul per well, and incubate at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"78pg6","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fipon","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"463C0880E2B911ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"4AB53490E2B911ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27b94","text":"DAY 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3logi","text":"3X PBS Washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2cni","text":"Remove primary Ab mix from wells and replace with 500ul 1X PBS (or use a dropper pipette and fill the well halfway)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qffu","text":"Incubate at RT on shaker for 15 min  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"27ekh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8DB8E6D0E2D511ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","id":0,"step_guid":"6F0DF310E2D511ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","title":"repeat two more times"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9l2fv","text":"Secondary Antibody ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h86i","text":"Make enough: goat anti-mouse AF-555 (1:500, Invitrogen, #A-21422) and biotin goat anti-rabbit (1:1000, Vector Labs, #PK-6101) in 1% NGS (Vector Labs, #S-1000-20) in 0.3% triton-X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cf2bm","text":"Remove PBS from wells and replace with 500ul Secondary antibody mix. Cover with aluminum foil. Note: secondary antibodies are light sensitive, so from this point on the plate MUST be covered from light as much as possible. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg319","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84fbo","text":"Incubate at RT on shaker for 120 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vf0c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"228h","text":"3X PBS washes as described in Step 5 and 5.1 with the plate covered    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dipri","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B5A065A0E2D611ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","id":0,"step_guid":"571886D0E2D511ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbe26","text":"Tertiary Antibody (for cFOS only)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"339o9","text":"make enough: AF-488 streptavidin conjugated (1:1000, Thermo Fisher, #S11223) in 1% NGS (Vector Labs, #S-1000-20) in 0.3% triton-X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1sm1","text":"Replace PBS in wells with 500uL of tertiary antibody solution, cover the plate with aluminum foil, and incubate at RT on shaker for 120 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b22qn","text":"3X PBS washes as described in step 5 and 5.1 with the plated covered   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8lea5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4A651D20E2D711ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","id":0,"step_guid":"571886D0E2D511ED9E36CBC113F2AD50","title":""}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3q3f9","text":"Mounting with medium with and without DAPI","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: If the mounting medium has DAPI included
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2dtcu","text":"Remove each slice from its well, move them into distilled water, mount on a charged superfrost slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ri87","text":"Make sure the slices are as flat as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa656","text":"Usually a whole well fits onto a slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9aps","text":"Once a slide is completed, allow it to dry for an hour until the tissue becomes kind of transparent, in dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":101,"length":8,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j93v","text":"Put 60ul of mounting medium on the slide, and coverslip","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22bak","text":"Allow it to cure as directed on the mounting medium user manual, and seal with nail polish if needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: If the mounting medium doesn't have DAPI included
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"43g6h","text":"Mix 1:10000 DAPI from the stock in -20 fridge with 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qg2b","text":"Put 500ul into each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8me1j","text":"Incubate covered on RT for 15 minutes (longer incubation will lead to a stronger signal, and vice versa but 15 is pretty good)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmpr8","text":"Remove DAPI solution and replace with 1X PBS and repeat the 3X washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doj22","text":"Rinse in distilled water and mount slices on a charged superfrost slide. One slide usually fits one well (6 slices).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cept","text":"Make sure the slices are as flat as possible. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9t4hk","text":"Dry the slide 1hr at RT in the dark (the sections will be kind of transparent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":24,"length":11,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48loh","text":"Put 60ul mounting medium on the slide, and coverslip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14lt2","text":"Allow it to cure as directed on the mounting medium user manual and seal with nail polish if needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: IHC_cFOS+Parvalbumin
